${modID}:MadJoker.NAME: Mad Joker
${modID}:MadJoker.DESCRIPTION: If the last card played this combat was an Attack, deal !D! damage.

${modID}:CleverJoker.NAME: Clever Joker
${modID}:CleverJoker.DESCRIPTION: If the last card played this combat was a Skill, gain !B! Block.

${modID}:JokerStencil.NAME: Joker Stencil
${modID}:JokerStencil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increased by +100% for each empty hand space.

${modID}:FourFingers.NAME: Four Fingers
${modID}:FourFingers.DESCRIPTION: Deal !${modID}:damage1!, !${modID}:damage2!, !${modID}:damage3! and !${modID}:damage4! damage to a random enemy.
${modID}:FourFingers.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !${modID}:damage1!, !${modID}:damage2!, !${modID}:damage3! and !${modID}:damage4! damage to an enemy.

${modID}:Mime.NAME: Mime
${modID}:Mime.DESCRIPTION: Play and Exhaust all cards in your hand randomly.

${modID}:CreditCard.NAME: Credit Card
${modID}:CreditCard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Gold. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CeremonialDagger.NAME: Ceremonial Dagger
${modID}:CeremonialDagger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Exhaust a random card and permanently increase this card's damage by twice it's cost. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:CeremonialDagger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Exhaust a card and permanently increase this card's damage by twice it's cost. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:MarbleJoker.NAME: Marble Joker
${modID}:MarbleJoker.DESCRIPTION: Add a Safety into your hand. NL Draw 1 card.
${modID}:MarbleJoker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a Safety+ into your hand. NL Draw 1 card.

${modID}:HalfJoker.NAME: Half Joker
${modID}:HalfJoker.DESCRIPTION: If you have 3 or less cards in your hand, deal !D! damage.

${modID}:Banner.NAME: Banner
${modID}:Banner.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Reduced by your cards in your discard pile.

${modID}:MysticSummit.NAME: Mystic Summit
${modID}:MysticSummit.DESCRIPTION: If there are no cards in your discard pile, deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:LoyaltyCard.NAME: Loyalty Card
${modID}:LoyaltyCard.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Every 6th card deals quadruple damage.

${modID}:EBall.NAME: 8 Ball
${modID}:EBall.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses 8 Strength this turn. NL !${modID}:probability! in !${modID}:chance! ${modID}:Chance to gain a random Potion. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Dusk.NAME: Dusk
${modID}:Dusk.DESCRIPTION: If this is the last card in your hand, replay all cards played this turn.

${modID}:RaisedFist.NAME: Raised Fist
${modID}:RaisedFist.DESCRIPTION: Gain temporary Strength equal to twice your lowest cost card in your hand.
${modID}:RaisedFist.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain temporary Strength equal to twice your lowest cost card in your hand.

${modID}:ChaosTheClown.NAME: Chaos the Clown
${modID}:ChaosTheClown.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile. NL Draw that many cards. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:ChaosTheClown.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile. NL Draw that many cards.

${modID}:Fibonacci.NAME: Fibonacci
${modID}:Fibonacci.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the fibonacci number of this turn (Turn !${modID}:turn!: !${modID}:fibonacci_damage! damage). NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Fibonacci.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the fibonacci number of this turn (Turn !${modID}:turn!: !${modID}:fibonacci_damage! damage).

${modID}:SteelJoker.NAME: Steel Joker
${modID}:SteelJoker.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain plated armor equal to your amount of upgraded cards in your deck. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:SteelJoker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain plated armor equal to your amount of upgraded cards in your deck. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ScaryFace.NAME: Scary Face
${modID}:ScaryFace.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Power, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:DelayedGratification.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Gain !M! Gold at the end of the turn if you didn't discard a card this turn.

${modID}:Pareidolia.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL All cards are considered Powers.

${modID}:GrosMichel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL !${modID}:probability! in !${modID}:chance! ${modID}:Chance to be removed from the deck.

${modID}:Supernova.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply X+1 Weak. NL Gain X+1 Regeneration. NL Exhaust.

played this turn. Changes at the end of each turn.
